verses.verse: How the <S%H2091>gold<s%> has become <S%H6004>dim!<s%> The <S%H2896>most<s%> pure <S%H3800>gold<s%> has <S%H8132>changed!<s%> The <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> are poured <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H2351>street.<s%>

The <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5537>comparable<s%> to fine <S%H6337>gold,<s%> How are they <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H5035>pitchers,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H3335>potter!<s%>

Even the <S%H8577>jackals<s%> draw <S%H2502>out<s%> the <S%H7699>breast,<s%> they <S%H3243>nurse<s%> their young <S%H1482>ones:<s%> The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> has become <S%H393>cruel,<s%> like the <S%H3283>ostriches<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the nursing <S%H3243>child<s%> <S%H1692>clings<s%> to the roof of his <S%H2441>mouth<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst:<s%> The young <S%H5768>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and no man breaks it to <S%H6566>them.<s%>

Those who <S%H398>fed<s%> <S%H4574>delicately<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets:<s%> Those who were brought <S%H539>up<s%> in <S%H8438>scarlet<s%> <S%H2263>embrace<s%> <S%H830>dunghills.<s%>

For the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1431>greater<s%> than the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> That was <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> as in a <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and no <S%H3027>hands<s%> were laid on <S%H2342>her.<s%>

Her <S%H5139>nobles<s%> were <S%H2141>purer<s%> than <S%H7950>snow,<s%> they were <S%H6705>whiter<s%> than <S%H2461>milk;<s%> They were more <S%H119>ruddy<s%> in <S%H6106>body<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies,<s%> their <S%H1508>polishing<s%> was as of <S%H5601>sapphire.<s%>

Their <S%H8389>appearance<s%> is <S%H2821>blacker<s%> than a <S%H7815>coal;<s%> they are not <S%H5234>known<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets:<s%> Their <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H6821>clings<s%> to their <S%H6106>bones;<s%> it is <S%H3001>withered,<s%> it has become like a <S%H6086>stick.<s%>

Those who are <S%H2491>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> are <S%H2896>better<s%> than those who are <S%H2491>killed<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger;<s%> For <S%H1992>these<s%> pine <S%H2100>away,<s%> <S%H1856>stricken<s%> <S%H8570>through,<s%> for want of the fruits of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7362>pitiful<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have <S%H1310>boiled<s%> their own <S%H3206>children;<s%> They were their <S%H1262>food<s%> in the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> he has poured <S%H8210>out<s%> his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger;<s%> He has <S%H3341>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which has <S%H398>devoured<s%> its <S%H3247>foundations.<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe, neither all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world,<s%> That the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> and the <S%H341>enemy<s%> would <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

It is because of the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of her <S%H3548>priests,<s%> That have <S%H8210>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>her.<s%>

They <S%H5128>wander<s%> as <S%H5787>blind<s%> men in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> they are <S%H1351>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> So that men <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H3830>garments.<s%>

<S%H5493>Depart!<s%> they <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H2931>them,<s%> Unclean! <S%H5493>depart,<s%> <S%H5493>depart,<s%> <S%H5060>don't<s%> touch! When they fled <S%H5132>away<s%> and <S%H5128>wandered,<s%> men <S%H559>said<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> They shall not <S%H1481>live<s%> here any <S%H3254>more.<s%>

The <S%H6440>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H2505>scattered<s%> <S%H3254>them;<s%> he will no more <S%H5027>regard<s%> <S%H5027>them:<s%> They didn't respect the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> they <S%H2603>didn't<s%> favor the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>

Our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> still <S%H3615>fail,<s%> looking in <S%H1892>vain<s%> for our <S%H5833>help:<s%> In our <S%H6836>watching<s%> we have <S%H6822>watched<s%> for a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that could not <S%H3467>save.<s%>

They <S%H6679>hunt<s%> our <S%H6806>steps,<s%> so that we <S%H3212>can't<s%> go in our <S%H7339>streets:<s%> Our <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H7126>near,<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled;<s%> for our <S%H7093>end<s%> has <S%H935>come.<s%>

Our <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> were <S%H7031>swifter<s%> than the <S%H5404>eagles<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky:<s%> They <S%H1814>chased<s%> us on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for us in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

The <S%H7307>breath<s%> of our <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their <S%H7825>pits;<s%> Of whom we <S%H559>said,<s%> Under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H7797>Rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz:<s%> The <S%H3563>cup<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through to you <S%H7937>also;<s%> you shall be drunken, and shall make yourself <S%H6168>naked.<s%>

The punishment of your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H8552>accomplished,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> he will no <S%H3254>more<s%> carry you away into <S%H1540>captivity:<s%> He will <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> he will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
